title: Bodnant Garden - please identify serif font
content:
Hi,

Does anyone know what font this is please? The nearest I could find was Perpetua but that's not quite right.

Thanks in advance
author: designmatic

comments.content:
Sorry, the first post didn't have an attachment!

Here it is: [http://designmatic.co.uk/bodnant/bodnant.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130526025218/http:/designmatic.co.uk/bodnant/bodnant.jpg "http://designmatic.co.uk/bodnant/bodnant.jpg")

Possibly [Classic Roman 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20130526025218/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/classicroman2.php) by John Studden - with a modified 't'? Or perhaps that was the 't' in version 1 of the font.

Hi Mike,

Many thanks for your help - that's great!
